content.raw:
good point, we can be more careful about that. before calling `GetElement`, we should check if it `HasElement`, and if not, return a default value, probably `"dantzig"`. we should document the default value in the `GetElement` doxygen

also, we should add this parameter to the `DARTPhysics::[GS]etParam` functions. see pull request #2512 and [ODEPhysics::SetParam](#!/osrf/gazebo/src/40c062da7dcc0ca6977a420cc7e66cd7a4f9f9eb/gazebo/physics/ode/ODEPhysics.cc?fileviewer=file-view-default#ODEPhysics.cc-1410)
content.html:
good point, we can be more careful about that. before calling GetElement, we should check if it HasElement, and if not, return a default value, probably "dantzig". we should document the default value in the GetElement doxygen

also, we should add this parameter to the DARTPhysics::[GS]etParam functions. see pull request #2512 and ODEPhysics::SetParam
